name: 仙路争锋-GM畅玩版
description:
Exquisite fairy tale fantasy scenes, vast fairy tale world, fierce battle bosses, divine costume creation, appearance collection, fairy pet cultivation, and crossing into immortals, opening up a unique and charming Eastern fairy tale world for you!
Reversing Heaven and Changing Destiny: Overcoming Robbery with Your Body, Achieving Immortal Path
【 World boss 】 Ultimate divine outfit, easy to hit and explosive
【 Partner Recruitment 】 Perfect partner, accompanying adventure
[Immortal Chaos Battle] Camp Competition, Winner as King
【 Cross server Martial Arts Competition 】 Peak duel, overlooking the group of immortals
publishers: 海量福利免费领，天天送真充！
